verbose_text: In the present study, changes in myocardial collagen fiber content, angiotensin II type 1 receptor (AT1R) content, and the expression of connective tissue growth factor (CTGF) were studied in the stimulation of SO 2 inhalation and exercise, to investigate the effects and mechanism of SO 2 inhalation and appropriate exercise on myocardial collagen fibers.
evidence: expression of connective tissue growth factor
